attributes.background: Due to the ongoing European Migration crisis I believe we need a Referendum now not in 2017. Leaving the Eu would give us back control of our borders, more control of our laws and regulations,and more money in our pockets,  according to theknow.eu it cost 12 billion net to be part of Europe, in 2014

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105863

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
